alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 5:57AM AKDT until March 28 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Southeastern Brooks Range. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and lowest visibility are expected near passes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
